attributes.action: honour William Wilberforce by putting his portrait on the £10 banknote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "honour William Wilberforce by putting his portrait on the £10 banknote."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12227.asp

Prime Minister's Office
